definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: The new technique of electromagnetic pulse vibration excitation is a kind of non-contact transient vibration excitation.
sentences.chinese: 新型电磁脉冲激振技术是一种非接触的瞬态激振。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic pulsed warhead is just designed for this goal.
sentences.chinese: 电磁脉冲战斗部正是为这一目标而设计的。

sentences.english: Nor are aircraft the only vehicles from which destructive electromagnetic pulses can be launched.
sentences.chinese: 飞行器亦非唯一可发射破坏性电磁脉冲的运载工具。

sentences.english: The air molecules also attenuate to some degree the generation of an electromagnetic pulse.
sentences.chinese: 空气分子也稀薄到可产生电磁脉冲的程度。

sentences.english: The U. S. military hasinvestigated the idea of laser-powered EMPs in the past.
sentences.chinese: 美国军方过去曾经研究激光电磁脉冲的理念。

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
